reviews.review: 匹配系统就是狗s，别人游戏越来越好，这个越来越垃圾。

My favorite game. Seems to be a love it or hate it thing for most. Just have fun on both sides of the exchange. Remember that you are trying to either KILL or SURVIVE. dont be entitled to your belief that you should win. Its a cat and mouse game. sometimes we all win. but nobody wins when you bring toxicity as an offering.

This game is just a frustration simulator. Logging into this game is like eating hair. You choke and gag it down. Then after you sit there nauseous and bewildered, you wonder, "Why did I do that to myself?"

Since the patch, I have zero wins and zero kills. How does it go from two to three kills a game to nothing in a single patch? I've played this a long time, thinking it would get better as I get better, but it just seems like every match is arbitrary.

This is the only game I have ever played that makes me feel bad after playing. I've had games that make me angry but I always want to go back and beat it or try again. This game is like a belittling parent who taunts you when you fall, then kicks your heels when you start walking again.

Not sure what I will do. When the game is fun, it's good. But lately the fun is vastly overshadowed by the monotony, the frustration and a sense of futility. I'm not sure if I want to bother getting better now, as there is no pay off. Nothing changes, there is no progression. It's just a ranking reset that doesn't  actually mean or do anything. I don't recommend it to new players. The frustration and time to improve are too high for what you get in return.

Update: I hate this game now after the update. I'm done. Survivors are shot out a cannon when you hit them and gain so much distance now it's stupid. There's no fear for them because they outrun a single hit like its a five second dead hard. I hit them and it takes 15 to 20 seconds just to get close enough to trigger chase music. Idiotic. Killers are a joke. There's no point in being a punching bag match after match. Killers are supposed to be the aggressors, not survivors. Might as well just finish what you started BHVR and make it a survivor only game because being killer now it's like I'm just part of the scenery.

Arreglen su juegos hijos de mil putas. Cómo puede ser que intente jugar con mi amigo hace como 3 meses y tengamos el mismo problema de que no nos podemos unir a la misma sala. En vez de sacar skines y asesinos chotos arreglen su juego de mierda.
挺好玩的，虽然是小萌新，但是每天都有在变强呢，加油米娜桑！

survivor or killer, if you want to have fun, just follow this one rule - make sure feng dies first

EDIT: i wrote this as a complete baby player, and anger at specific players drove me to make hasty generalizations about who people play. i can say now that i was truly wrong.

kill nea first
Just don't do it. If you're looking for a sign, this is it. Don't buy it.
NO JUEGUEN ESTE JUEGO, ES UNA PORONGA
Very fun to play with friends & family. Mechanics system is simple, skill & challenge is vast.

If you hate yourself, have a below than average IQ, are as mature as a child, or a masochist, PLAY THIS GAME. Otherwise, prepare to lose your mind over a horrifying game of hide and seek tag. I have nightmares about this game and am seeking therapy, and not about the serial killers that are trying to mutilate you to death, but the survivors that run around you like a game of ring around the rosie, furiously tea-bagging in your face as you stare at them powerless to do anything because of the infinite resources they're given. After this traumatic experience, I cannot play another game of hide and seek or tag, let alone recommend this game.
Jogo muito bom, mecânica ótima, me divirto muito jogando. Vale a pena.
If you love horror movies it's 100% worth it. survivor is easy to learn and easy to be good at

I will never understand how this game got popular if in all your matches, you just get generators up, handle survivors getting hooked or being the killer chasing them down. I can't find fun, maybe you can. But to be honest, this is just way too simplistic of a game for what i want out of this.

Every game is non-linear and chuck full of surprises. When you think it's over you unexpected happens and vice versa. Been playing this game since beta and will continue to play to a long time forward. Keep up the good work Behavior

Personally, I can not recommend this game. I love survival horror games however this one just rubs me the wrong way and I can't get into it.

I prefer to play the survivors in games like this because I like to work together with my friends to beat a common enemy. This game does not let me do that. Your survivor allies are just as much your enemy as the killer. If you work to try and keep them alive you are going to be noticed by the killer and thus killed. I find myself getting to a point in each match where I let my team mates die because I'll die if I save them, which is just not a good feeling when it is presented like you are working together to beat the killer.

Not my type of game but maybe it is for you.
Este juego me está arruinando la vida, que no les pase a ustedes
Really fun to play with friends on this game

Fantastic game with nice graphics, sound and music, and incredible themes found in the killers, survivors, maps, and lore. However, while myself, the rest of the playerbase, and the developers all care about this game, there's alot of infighting and toxicity that can't really be helped. 10/10 would kill/escape again, but like most things it is best in moderation and taken with a grain of salt (or a gallon XD).

Played this game for a bit, I can say for sure it's literally so bad and it's not something I think of playing anymore
